title: Five-Star Chateau Escape Close to Paris
description: Take the romance up a notch with an enchanting escape to the French countryside and stay in a lavish chateau fit for royalty. Only an hour drive from Paris, you’ll find five-star comfort bounded by the lush green trees of the Chantilly Forest. Enjoy three, five or seven nights at Tiara Chateau Hotel Mont Royal with daily buffet breakfast and a welcome drink for two.
offer_address: Allée des Marronniers, Route de Plailly, 60520 La Chapelle-en-Serval, France
